skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer ¨C Smalley , Hull Number DD-565.
skins.selfIntroduction: Fletcher-class destroyer, Smalley. I did radar pickets, patrols, rescues, diplomatic functions, and basically a bit of everything. My hobbies...? Do I really have to repeat what I said before?
skins.acquisition: Destroyer Smalley, reporting in. Interests: kickboxing.
skins.login: Commander, can I train in your office?
skins.details: Baltimore...? Oh, Commander... I didn't notice you because I was training.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'll show you some exercises. You can even do these while sitting down. Not moving around is bad for your health.
skins.secretaryIdle2: There are very few restrictions to what you can do in kickboxing. However, it's not very useful in naval combat... so that's why it's just a hobby.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I want to spar with the battleships. They all seem strong.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want me to show you the ropes? It's good for self-defense.

skins.shipDescription: I am the courier of the night. In other words, it's my job to bring stuff straight to you, Commander. Here you go, this jack-o-lantern is for you.
skins.acquisition: I am the courier of the night. In other words, it's my job to bring stuff straight to you, Commander. Here you go, this jack-o-lantern is for you.
skins.login: Let's use this jack-o-lantern to decorate your office. I'm putting it right here.
skins.details: I can help everyone out and get some training in at the same time. This is the kind of work that I like.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Rumors of wasabi-flavored candy? Never heard of it. I'm just the delivery witch.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ghosts and monsters? If they exist, line 'em up and I'll knock 'em down.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My broom? Who needs to fly when you can just run faster.
skins.secretaryTouch: Is there anything you'd like me to deliver?
